entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
